site_name: ANTIGALLICAN, 428 WOOLWICH ROAD, GREENWICH, LONDON, SE7 8SU
description: Change of Use from Hotel (Use Class C1) to a 49 shared living units HMO (Use Class Sui Generis), whilst retaining Public House at ground floor level (Use Class Sui Generis) as amendment to planning permission dated 29/05/2019 Ref: 18/2673/F for Demolition of existing single storey projection from east elevation and construction of a 3-storey side extension and a rooftop extension.

superseding_details.unit_reference: Nr 428 Woolwich Road is to be externally modified/ extended identically as per the approved scheme 18/2673/F
superseding_details.component_description: but the use is to be changed from Hotel C1 to shared accommodation (Sui Generis), whilst retaining the Use of Pub as existing and as approved in 18/2673/F
